issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
I get the following error when I try to build:
[ERROR] Invalid --sim-version value '6.0'
Accepted values:
   6.1

I'll dig in and post a work-around. But I wanted to warn you.
fields.summary: Issue with building project with iOS 6.1 simulator
fields.environment:
OSX 10.7.5 (Lion)
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Build: jenkins-titanium-rcp-master-350 (origin/master)
Date: 18 December 2012, 12:04:42

comments.body: Work around is to rebuild the project. :)
